status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
When running recurring Android builds, I noticed this log:
{code}
[INFO]  Forcing rebuild: tiapp.xml navbar-hidden changed since last build
[INFO]    Was: false
[INFO]    Now: undefined
{code}
The flag was not changed (is false in tiapp.xml). Just create a new app, run it twice and watch the logs.
fields.summary: Android: Forces recompiling due to "navbar-hidden" change
